title: game closes after victory or defeat
body: The game auto closes and puts me in the post game results screen after victory or defeat instead of me having to click the continue button. Its not a big issue but im wondering why this happens now? sometimes i like to hear the little story at the end when playing lisandra oh howling abyss.

replies.body: There was a small change in one of the recent patches that forced people out of that victory/defeat screen after about 5-10 seconds. Little unfortunate, but it helps prevent people from getting stuck on that victory screen.

Aww, that sucks. Im going to miss watching people dance at the end of games but if it was to help people experiencing a bug then its for the best. 
thanks for your reply.
